Class DirectionType

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Contains various commonly used direction sets.
    Author:
    Florian Bethe

      • getConeMovement

        public static final java.util.Set<Direction> getConeMovement(Direction cone)
        Returns the set of directions which form a 'cone' around the provided direction. Prime example for this is the pawn's capturing moves.
        Parameters:
        cone - Direction in which the cone shall point
        Returns:
        Set of directions
